name: The God and the Fate Revolution Paradox
name_original: The God and the Fate Revolution Paradox
description:
The God and the Fate Revolution Paradox is a RPG game developed by Nippon Ichi Software and Counter Stop. It came out on 24-01-2013. Nippon Ichi Software published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
The God and the Fate Revolution Paradox is available on PlayStation 3.
